attributes.action: Raise the personal allowance to £10,000 as no one on an Income below this should have to pay tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an accountant for years I have seen the self employed low paid struggle to pay tax. Nobody can live on under £10,000 to cover mortgage/rent, utilities, council tax and food therefore I believe noone should pay tax on Income below £10,000 a year.
